ch.unibe.iam.graph
Class GraphTraversal

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.graph.GraphTraversal
Direct Known Subclasses:
DfsTraversal
public abstract class GraphTraversal
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a common API for all graph traversals using the Template Design Pattern. This class sets up the outline or skeleton of an algorithm for a graph traversal, leaving the details to specific implementations later. This way, subclasses can override parts of the traversal without changing its overall structure.

Version:
$Revision: 1.8 $ $Date: 2003/03/19 14:00:38 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger
